name: Michael's Jukebox
description:
Are you a fan of Michael Boxface but tired of having to be connected to the internet to listen to some of his music? Well that problem is no more with Michael's Jukebox which always you to play his songs offline (Download Version Only). Featuring 3 Albums with 10 songs in total including Michael's First Album, 1 Single from each of the other original 4 cardboard gang members and a hidden album with a sneak peak of Michael's upcoming song. 

Michael's First Album:

Bloxburg State Of MindDecember 29, 2019Shoe Egg SoulJanuary 2, 2020Blessing In Disguise January 30, 2020Communism Or CapitalismMarch 8, 2020The Way You Dividing May 12, 2020You Butter Love CornJuly 10, 2020

Michael's friends Frank, Vince, and Ghost joined in on the fun and each wrote and original song to debut in this app and that can not be found anywhere else.

Other Cardboard Singles:

VinceScary DinosaurFrankUs & WeGhostHollow

Still want more of Michael Boxface? The come and check out his YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/MichaelBoxface/featured
